      • findAllEntities

        public <T,E1 extends java.lang.Enum<E1>,E2 extends java.lang.Enum<E2>> java.util.List<T> findAllEntities(java.lang.Class<T> resultClass,
                                                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> filtersString,
                                                                                                         java.util.List<java.lang.String> ordersString,
                                                                                                         java.lang.Class<E1> allowedFilters,
                                                                                                         java.lang.Class<E2> allowedOrders)
                                                                                                  throws java.lang.Exception
        Find all entities with specified filters and orders criteria.
        Type Parameters:
        T - the generic type of the entity
        E1 - the generic type of the enum representing the allowed filters
        E2 - the generic type of the enum representing the allowed orders
        Parameters:
        resultClass - the result class of the entities
        filtersString - the list of filters string
        ordersString - the list of orders string
        allowedFilters - the enum of allowed filters
        allowedOrders - the enum of allowed orders
        Returns:
        the list of entities
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception - the exception thrown when there are errors with parameters
